game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the lost artifact
game.description: An ancient artifact has been lost in the dark forest of Eldridge. Your task is to retrieve this artifact and bring it back to the royal museum.
game.reward: 500 gold coins and a rare sword

tasks.description: You must pass through the Eldridge forest and avoid the dangerous creatures that lurk in the shadows.
You must find the lost artifact which is said to shine with a bright blue light.

tasks.objective: Return the artifact to the royal museum
tasks.description: After retrieval, return the artifact immediately to the royal museum.
